page.title: 01Lothingland General Review
page.content: Our area is a particularly beautiful part of rural North Suffolk, dominated by mostly arable farms. Lothingland Middle School is set in the heart of this although only a fifth of our 400 children come from the villages of Ashby, Lound, Somerleyton and Blundeston. Most of our children are bussed from Oulton Broad which is five miles away. Because Lothingland School is situated at Lound, most of our articles use the village as a starting point. However we do have contributions from Somerleyton Primary School who celebrated their 140th Anniversary this year. Although we live in times of changes, the roads, houses, fields, hedgerows and churches reflect the past more clearly than the present. By Mr. B. Sutton (Project Co-ordinator)
